caption.p: Location of the studied rock art sites in the limestone karsts of Maros-Pangkep, Sulawesi (Indonesia). The regional map (right) shows the insular shelf exposed during the Last Glacial Maximum. Inset map of Maros-Pangkep sites includes the location of a first/second order stream at the base of the karst. L is an abbreviation for Leang (Cave). Map created by Maria Kottermair.
